Name: Genie
Description: Summons a Genie to attack any monster in line of sight with 5 combat dice.

Name: Swift Wind
Description: Target Hero may roll twice as many dice for movement on their next turn.

Name: Tempest
Description: Causes a small whirlwind; target monster misses its next turn.

Name: Heal Body
Description: Target Hero regains up to 4 lost Body Points.

Name: Pass Through Rock
Description: Target Hero can move through walls on their next turn.

Name: Rock Skin
Description: Target Hero gains 1 extra defense die until they take damage.

Name: Ball of Flame
Description: Inflicts 2 Body Points of damage on any monster the caster can see.

Name: Courage
Description: Target Hero rolls 2 extra attack dice until there are no monsters in sight.

Name: Fire of Wrath
Description: Inflicts 1 Body Point of damage on any monster the caster can see.

Name: Sleep
Description: Target monster falls asleep; cannot move or attack until it rolls a 6.

Name: Veil of Mist
Description: Target Hero can move past monsters without being blocked.

Name: Water of Healing
Description: Target Hero regains up to 4 lost Body Points.
